Package game.weapons

Class GiantHammer

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapons.GiantHammer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Weapon, ActiveSkill, Sellable
public class GiantHammer
extends WeaponItem
implements Sellable, ActiveSkill
The GiantHammer class represents a specialized weapon item with unique actions and abilities. It extends the WeaponItem class and implements the Sellable and ActiveSkill interfaces.
